name: Reaper!
description:
Collect souls to buy cool powers in this cute little roguelike made for Ludum Dare 44!

Controls:

  • Move -- WASD/Arrow Keys
  • Jump -- W / Space
  • Slash -- Left Shift / Left Click
  • Pause/Open Shop -- Esc / P
  • Restart -- R / Del
  • Unlock Skills -- Click on them!

Can't figure out how to jump or attack? Open the Shop (by pausing or clicking the icon in the top right) and click on skills you want to buy!
